name: Shengong 'Shui' Knife
description: The Shengong 'Shui' Knife is equivalent to Tier 2 Tech like the Iron Knife , giving Prospectors the ability to skin larger animals, such as Buffalo and Grizzly Bears . Unlike Throwing Knives , the Shengong 'Shui' Knife cannot be thrown. There currently are no Workshop throwing knives.
